HOME.SECONDARY: Single platform at the junction of engineering and Java, Web technologies
HOME.JAVAMACH:
JIMCOIT

Cluster that unites organizations and people on a voluntary basis on a single principle: using of the Java programming language and Web technologies to solve the major problems of and industry.

Our goal is to create a unified practical, scientific, educational platform on the main principles of Industry 4.0
HOME.INDUSTRY4:
Industry 4.0

Transformation into a completely digital manufacturing, managed by intelligent systems that interact with the environment, moving beyond the enterprise to form a global industrial network.

It includes Big Data, on the basis of which solutions are formed.

Interaction of modules, using network protocols and sensors that implements Internet of Things (IoT).
HOME.ERP:
ERP Systems

Implement the principle of visibility. Allow to see the company's picture in real time and make the necessary decisions in the event that it is not possible to ensure the collection of data without human intervention. The data is stored in the cloud to which the ERP system is connected.
